segments.text: I see a little girl standing nearby, watching the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her arm raised, hand open, clearly expecting a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely in this together, a team of tiny conspirators.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a bold move, given the adult is right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer audacity of these children is almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why aren't they asking for permission instead of sneaking around?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see them breaking rules right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so innocent, but they're clearly up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they often get away with such escapades.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tension in the air, with the danger and the mischief, is palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on the cookies, they probably don't even see the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they learn to respect boundaries eventually.
segments.speaker: PAR
